程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.log.kcvs

类 KCVSLogManager

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.log.kcvs.KCVSLogManager
所有已实现的接口:
LogManager
public class KCVSLogManager
extends Object
implements LogManager
Implementation of LogManager against an arbitrary KeyColumnValueStoreManager. Issues Log instances which wrap around a KeyColumnValueStore.
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    static int CLUSTER_SIZE_DIVIDER
    If LOG_MAX_PARTITIONS isn't set explicitly, the number of partitions is derived by taking the configured GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CLUSTER_MAX_PARTITIONS and dividing the number by this constant.
    static ConfigOption<Boolean> LOG_FIXED_PARTITION  
    static ConfigOption<Integer> LOG_MAX_PARTITIONS  

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器 说明
    KCVSLogManager​(KeyColumnValueStoreManager storeManager, Configuration config)
    Opens a log manager against the provided KCVS store with the given configuration.
    KCVSLogManager​(KeyColumnValueStoreManager storeManager, Configuration config, int[] readPartitionIds)
    Opens a log manager against the provided KCVS store with the given configuration.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void close()
    Closes the log manager and all open logs (if they haven't already been explicitly closed)
    KCVSLog openLog​(String name)
    Opens a log for the given name.

    • LOG_FIXED_PARTITION

      public static final ConfigOption<Boolean> LOG_FIXED_PARTITION

    • LOG_MAX_PARTITIONS

      public static final ConfigOption<Integer> LOG_MAX_PARTITIONS

    • CLUSTER_SIZE_DIVIDER

      public static final int CLUSTER_SIZE_DIVIDER
      If LOG_MAX_PARTITIONS isn't set explicitly, the number of partitions is derived by taking the configured GraphDatabaseConfiguration.CLUSTER_MAX_PARTITIONS and dividing the number by this constant.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

  • 构造器详细资料

    • KCVSLogManager

      public KCVSLogManager​(KeyColumnValueStoreManager storeManager, Configuration config)
      Opens a log manager against the provided KCVS store with the given configuration.
      参数:
      storeManager -
      config -

    • KCVSLogManager

      public KCVSLogManager​(KeyColumnValueStoreManager storeManager, Configuration config, int[] readPartitionIds)
      Opens a log manager against the provided KCVS store with the given configuration. Also provided is a list of read-partition-ids. These only apply when readers are registered against an opened log. In that case, the readers only read from the provided list of partition ids.
      参数:
      storeManager -
      config -
      readPartitionIds -

  • 方法详细资料

    • openLog

      public KCVSLog openLog​(String name) throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: LogManager
      Opens a log for the given name.

      If a log with the given name already exists, the existing log is returned.

      指定者:
      openLog 在接口中 LogManager
      参数:
      name - Name of the log to be opened
      返回:
      抛出:
      BackendException

    • close

      public void close() throws BackendException
      从接口复制的说明: LogManager
      Closes the log manager and all open logs (if they haven't already been explicitly closed)
      指定者:
      close 在接口中 LogManager
      抛出:
      BackendException
